summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AR Learning System MVP. Backend APIs working excellently (14/15 tests passed), frontend user flows functioning properly for both student and admin roles, AR model viewer operational, assessment system with adaptive difficulty working, performance analytics and leaderboard functional.

minor_bugs.issue: Login test failed due to timestamp mismatch in test credentials
minor_bugs.impact: Test-only issue, registration provides tokens correctly

model_url_issues.issue: Some sample 3D model URLs return 404 errors
model_url_issues.impact: Model viewer shows error for specific models

design_issues.issue: Subject IDs displayed as truncated UUIDs instead of subject names in charts

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix 3D model URLs that return 404 errors and improve subject name display in performance charts. Consider using more reliable 3D model hosting or fallback URLs.
